review: I give it 2 stars only because I live in Trinidad and Tobago and cannot access the prime content along with other apps..I am only able to utilize Netflix. ..if I had known this/if the merchants from where I purchased the fire tv had told me this(telling myself they should of been aware of this)I would of gone with my first choice of a wifi bluray player. ..even after becoming a prime amazon trial holder..I am still not able to view movies because of geographical reasons...sooooI would not recommend for Caribbean folks..Now I see other boxes that apparently give more free content than the fire tv..Amazon...cant yall do anything about this...after paying so much..with high hopes of cutting my cable...now to be sooooooo sorely dissatisfied. ..and disappointed. .
